alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry, central Butts and southwestern Newton Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Ola, or near McDonough. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Jackson, Locust Grove, Jenkinsburg, Stewart, Ola, Worthville, Fincherville, Stark, Rocky Plains and Blacksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
